messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1062
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I gave an answer to the person asking about the Pharoah game, but it went to her email and not to the group. Sorry. :( I don t  know what I did wrong. But
messages.messageBody:
Hi, I gave an answer to the person asking about the
Pharoah game, but it went to her email and not to the
group. Sorry. :( I don't know what I did wrong. But
anyway, you can find the game at Walmart and probably
other places. I admire my son because he doesn't
accept gifts of slaves from other rulers, even though
the slaves would save him money on labor. He knows
it's just a game, but the idea of owning even pretend
slaves is abhorrent to him. *sniff* I'm so proud! :)
In this series, there are also games of Zeus, King
Arthur, Cleopatra, etc. We're all hoping a Queen
Elizabeth I game will come out sooner or later. Juli
